SEARCH
Package Models

Class User

java.lang.Object
Models.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist
public abstract class User extends Object implements Serializable
The User class serves as an abstract representation of a user in the system. It is the base class for all specific user types (e.g., Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist). The class implements Serializable to support data persistence.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • User

      public User()
      Constructs a default User object with no attributes set.

    • User

      public User(String userID, String name, String password, String role, String gender, int age)
      Constructs a User object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      userID - the unique identifier for the user.
      name - the name of the user.
      password - the password for the user account.
      role - the role of the user in the system.
      gender - the gender of the user.
      age - the age of the user.

  • Method Details

    • login

      public boolean login(String enteredPassword)
      Validates the user's login by checking the provided password against the stored password.
      Parameters:
      enteredPassword - the password entered by the user.
      Returns:
      true if the entered password matches the stored password, false otherwise.
